item.text: Next we set out on the route to Bashan, but King Og of Bashan and his whole army came out to meet us in battle at Edrei.

The Lord, however, said to me, “Don’t be afraid of him because I have already given him, his whole army, and his land to you. You will do to him exactly what you did to King Sihon of the Amorites who lived in Heshbon.”
So the Lord our God did indeed give over to us King Og of Bashan and his whole army, and we struck them down until not a single survivor was left.

We <st data-num="03920" class="">captured</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> his <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> at <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="06256" class="">time</st>—there <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> a <st data-num="07151" class="">town</st> we did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">from</st> them—<st data-num="08346" class="">sixty</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="02256" class="">region</st> of <st data-num="0709" class="">Argob</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="04467" class="">dominion</st> of <st data-num="05747" class="">Og</st> in <st data-num="01316" class="">Bashan</st>.

<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> of <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> were <st data-num="01219" class="">fortified</st> by <st data-num="01364" class="">high</st> <st data-num="02346" class="">walls</st>, <st data-num="01817" class="">gates</st>, and <st data-num="01280" class="">locking bars</st>;<n id="1" /> in <st data-num="0905" class="">addition</st> there were a <st data-num="03966" class="">great</st> <st data-num="07235" class="">many</st> <st data-num="06521" class="">open</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">villages</st>.<n id="2" />

We <st data-num="02763" class="">put</st> all of these <st data-num="02763" class="">under divine judgment</st><n id="1" /> just <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> we had <st data-num="06213" class="">done</st> to <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="05511" class="">Sihon</st> of <st data-num="02809" class="">Heshbon</st>—<st data-num="02763 03605">every</st> <st data-num="04962" class="">occupied</st> <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>,<n id="2" /> including <st data-num="0802" class="">women</st> and <st data-num="02945" class="">children</st>.

But <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0929" class="">livestock</st> and <st data-num="07998" class="">plunder</st> from the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> we <st data-num="0962" class="">kept</st> for ourselves.

So at <st data-num="01931" class="">that</st> <st data-num="06256" class="">time</st> we <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0567" class="">Amorite</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">kings</st> in the <st data-num="05676 03383">Transjordan</st> from <st data-num="05158" class="">Wadi</st> <st data-num="0769" class="">Arnon</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">Mount</st> <st data-num="02768" class="">Hermon</st><n id="1" />

(the <st data-num="06722" class="">Sidonians</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="07121" class="">call</st> <st data-num="02768" class="">Hermon</st> <st data-num="08303" class="">Sirion</st><n id="2" /> and the <st data-num="0567" class="">Amorites</st> <st data-num="07121" class="">call</st> it <st data-num="08149" class="">Senir</st>),<n id="3" />

<st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> of the <st data-num="04334" class="">plateau</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st> and <st data-num="01316" class="">Bashan</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> <st data-num="05548" class="">Salecah</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0154" class="">Edrei</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> of the <st data-num="04467" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="05747" class="">Og</st> in <st data-num="01316" class="">Bashan</st>.

Only King Og of Bashan was left of the remaining Rephaites. (It is noteworthy that his sarcophagus was made of iron. Does it not, indeed, still remain in Rabbath of the Ammonites? It is 13½ feet long and 6 feet wide according to standard measure.)
This is the land we brought under our control at that time: The territory extending from Aroer by the Wadi Arnon and half the Gilead hill country with its cities I gave to the Reubenites and Gadites.

The <st data-num="03499" class="">rest</st> of <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of <st data-num="01316" class="">Bashan</st>, the <st data-num="04467" class="">kingdom</st> of <st data-num="05747" class="">Og</st>, I <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> to <st data-num="02677" class="">half</st> the <st data-num="07626" class="">tribe</st> of <st data-num="04519" class="">Manasseh</st>.<n id="1" /> (<st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="02256" class="">region</st> of <st data-num="0709" class="">Argob</st>,<n id="2" /> that is, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="01316" class="">Bashan</st>, is <st data-num="07121" class="">called</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="07497" class="">Rephaim</st>.

<st data-num="02971" class="">Jair</st>, <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of <st data-num="04519" class="">Manasseh</st>, <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="0709" class="">Argob</st> <st data-num="02256" class="">region</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> with the <st data-num="01651" class="">Geshurites</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="04602" class="">Maacathites</st><n id="2" />—namely <st data-num="01316">Bashan</st>—and <st data-num="07121" class="">called</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">by</st> his <st data-num="08034" class="">name</st>, <st data-num="02334" class="">Havvoth Jair</st>,<n id="3" /> which it retains <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> very <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>.)
I <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st> to <st data-num="04353" class="">Machir</st>.<n id="1" />

To the <st data-num="07206" class="">Reubenites</st> and <st data-num="01425" class="">Gadites</st> I <st data-num="05414" class="">allocated</st> the territory extending <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> <st data-num="01568" class="">Gilead</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">as far as</st> <st data-num="05158" class="">Wadi</st> <st data-num="0769" class="">Arnon</st> (the exact <st data-num="08432" class="">middle</st> of the <st data-num="05158" class="">wadi</st> was a <st data-num="01366" class="">boundary</st>) <st data-num="05704" class="">all the way to</st> the <st data-num="05158" class="">Wadi</st> <st data-num="02999" class="">Jabbok</st>, the <st data-num="01121 05983"> Ammonite</st> <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st>.
The rift valley and the Jordan River were also a border, from the Sea of Kinnereth to the sea of the rift valley (that is, the Salt Sea), beneath the slopes of Pisgah to the east.
At that time I instructed you as follows: “The Lord your God has given you this land for your possession. You warriors are to cross over equipped for battle before your fellow Israelites.

<st data-num="07535" class="">But</st> your <st data-num="0802" class="">wives</st>, <st data-num="02945" class="">children</st>, and <st data-num="04735" class="">livestock</st> (of which I <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> you have <st data-num="04735 07227">many</st>) may <st data-num="03427" class="">remain</st> in the <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st> I have <st data-num="05414" class="">given</st> you.

You must fight until the Lord gives your countrymen victory as he did you and they take possession of the land that the Lord your God is giving them on the other side of the Jordan River. Then each of you may return to his own territory that I have given you.”
I also commanded Joshua at the same time, “You have seen everything the Lord your God did to these two kings; he will do the same to all the kingdoms where you are going.
Do not be afraid of them, for the Lord your God will personally fight for you.”
Moreover, at that time I pleaded with the Lord,
“O, Sovereign Lord, you have begun to show me your greatness and strength. (What god in heaven or earth can rival your works and mighty deeds?)

Let me <st data-num="04994" class="">please</st> <st data-num="05674" class="">cross over</st> to <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> on the <st data-num="05676" class="">other side</st> of the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st> River—<st data-num="02088" class="">this</st> <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> <st data-num="02022" class="">hill country</st> and the <st data-num="03844" class="">Lebanon</st>!”<n id="1" />
But the Lord was angry at me because of you and would not listen to me. Instead, he said to me, “Enough of that! Do not speak to me anymore about this matter.

<st data-num="05927" class="">Go up</st> to the <st data-num="07218" class="">top</st> of <st data-num="06449" class="">Pisgah</st> and <st data-num="05375" class="">take</st> a good <st data-num="05869" class="">look</st> to the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st>, <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st>, <st data-num="08486" class="">south</st>, and <st data-num="04217" class="">east</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> you will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> be allowed to <st data-num="05674" class="">cross</st> the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st>.

<st data-num="06680">Commission</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st>, and <st data-num="02388" class="">encourage</st> and <st data-num="0553" class="">strengthen</st> him, <st data-num="03588" class="">because</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> will <st data-num="05674 06440">lead</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">these</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="05674" class="">over</st> and will enable them to <st data-num="05157" class="">inherit</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> you will <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st>.”
So we settled down in the valley opposite Beth Peor.
